website_summaries.verdict: Despite some issues, this product is a good choice for anyone who is new to using marula, as it has a money-back guarantee if you decide it's not for you.
pros: Cold pressed and doesn't contain added fragrance
Company has received praise for attentive customer service
Offers a satisfaction or money-back guarantee
cons: Doesn't seem so absorb into the skin as well as some competitors

customer_reviews.title: Love It!👌
customer_reviews.text: I really love the quality of this oil. I'm a Makeup Artist and skin care junkie. I was doing a facial message on one of my clients and she absolutely loved how it made her skin glow. Ive used every high and low end brand out there and this is a superior product at a great price. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Makeupnutz

customer_reviews.title: Same as price
customer_reviews.text: Works great for me, same quality as Drunk Elephant marula oil for a fraction of the price. I used them both concurrently and could not distinguish between them. It is light weight and on me absorbs quickly. In fact I usually like to wet my hands with water or facial spray to make it spread easily and quickly.
customer_reviews.author: VFlower2011

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this for a few days and have used it twice. I did like the feel of it on my skin and will be looking forward to seeing the results of longer-term use. The product was delivered on time and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: jjbk

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product and good service and a usable pump. I use this as a facial moisturizer as soon as I get out of the shower. While it doesn't contain sunscreen, it is non-toxic and doesn't cause acne. It keeps my forehead moisturized well so that I avoid bumps that I used to get from dry skin. Sunscreen can be applied over, as needed. There is no odor. I'm very happy with 100% marula oil in general and the pump and price on this brand.
customer_reviews.author: LebkuchenHerzEngel

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t absorb well
customer_reviews.text: Maybe Marula oil just isn’t for me but this did not absorb well and made me break out. I regularly use jojoba oil & it absorbs fine. This just stayed on my skin, and I have combo aging skin that is dry & slightly oily. Not for me. First marula I’ve tried & would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: IMHO

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic oil!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil! I can’t say I’ve used it separately, but I use it in my DIY skin products, especially my oil cleanser, serum, body butter and face balm. It is a great addition for these creams because it helps calm eczema, psoriasis and dermatitis. If you have any of these issues, this oil is magnificent at soothing red, inflamed skin! Plus, I love the packaging of this brand of oils. Both I’ve ordered came in a nice box for storage instead of bubble wrap!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer KCNIX

customer_reviews.title: Best Amazing product ever
customer_reviews.text: No scent, but I've been using this for going on 3 years. I love this product. I use this every day and a spray goes a long way. What is left over I out in my hair and around my ears. I HIGHLY recommend this product. Of course wash your face before you use this and then add a sunscreen face lotion. Perfect combination 🥰
customer_reviews.author: Person who researched b4 buying

customer_reviews.title: Replenishes Skin and Affordable
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this marula oil daily instead of my normal face moisturizer. It helped replenish the dry areas of my skin. My skin is soft and has never looked better. It’s not oily but I have normal to dry skin. Not sure how it would work with oily skin. I previously used the Drunk Elephant brand which is over priced so I switched to this more affordable brand. I love it! Marula oil is the best for your skin.
customer_reviews.author: McJaff

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and makes skin soft
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight. I use very little, mostly at night then wake up to super soft supple skin. It does clear skin up but I don't use it every night. At times it makes my face feel a tad itchy. It has a weird smell but not bad.
customer_reviews.author: May Y.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great oil!
customer_reviews.text: I love this marula oil because it lists the benefits right on the front of the label. It is moisturizing, without being greasy. I am currently using this at night, but want to start using it during the day as well.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hair.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for use on my hair after falling in love with Theory marula oil. The price can’t be beat for the quality! It has left my hair soft, shiny and manageable without appearing oily at all. It performs exactly as the more expensive brand. One major difference is this one is not scented, which I prefer. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Monet Flores

customer_reviews.title: Need more time/follow up
customer_reviews.text: I have only had it for a few days and purchased it to try in place of a much pricier oil I'm almost out of. Will update after a month of use. I want to love this. Fast forward 7 months... the oil was forgotten I didn't see any benefits of it for the face. I used it for body moisturizer when I ran out of my preferred lotion and finally gave the rest to my daughter to use on her colored hair. I won't be repurchasing this again.
customer_reviews.author: floatablehen52

customer_reviews.title: My biggest beauty secret
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is miracle oil for clear, healthy looking skin. Have gotten several compliments. I see a difference shortly after applying.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Not safe to use! Recieved an open & used item
customer_reviews.text: 😡😡This item was clearly used!!!😡😡 Package is open as u can see and there's liquid inside the spray nozzle as you can see. I can't give this dirty dingy used item as a gift let alone keep it! Wouldn't be wise for me to use it considering they could've filled it back up with anything. This is a waist of my time and money. Going straight 2 the trash! 😒
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Marula oil for the budget conscious
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with Drunk Elephant’s marula oil, but not the price. I figured I would try the Calvin Schon marula oil and have found it to be equal to the DE marula oil, at a fraction of the price. I’m on my second bottle now!
customer_reviews.author: A. L. Witt

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Nice. Helped grow my edges and makes my hair soft
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Cleared up my skin
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for a few years. It illuminated my blemishes! It’s good for all skin types. My kids use it too!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Enloe

customer_reviews.title: Great for very dry skin
customer_reviews.text: Just received it a couple of days ago so only used it a day or two. My skin is very dry so it is helping a lot. Sure would like for it to help me look younger.
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Why pay $70 at Sephora?? They all work the same and even the packaging on this is very nice. Outstanding! I use Merula for my daily facial moisturizing routine.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn R

customer_reviews.title: I like to use this on my hands and nails as ...
customer_reviews.text: This oil has replaced my nighttime moisturizer! It helps keep my skin soft and moisturized. I like to use this on my hands and nails as well! I look forward to the long term results, as I have only been using this for about 4 months. I am also eager to see how well this works with my dry skin in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith C

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Used the product several times since purchase and it is great.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: I sure do love this
customer_reviews.text: It did exactly what it was supposed to do I really enjoyed having this product
customer_reviews.author: Nicolle newman

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!! Same as the expensive brands!
customer_reviews.text: Just like the expensive brands, great quality, right texture and thickness. You can tell it is pure and has the same benefits as the high priced brands.
customer_reviews.author: Carly Manning

customer_reviews.title: A great oil for your face
customer_reviews.text: Pump is a problem not sure if it was just mine.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Zelinsky

customer_reviews.title: but so far I LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: I was gone on a trip when my Marula Oil arrived, so I only am using it for last three days, but so far I LOVE it !!! It goes on smooth it absorbs fantastic!! I wake up with smooth smooth skin. I need to add that I am in my fifties, so any help I can get I take it!!! I highly recommend that!!
customer_reviews.author: Dorota

customer_reviews.title: which makes it seem like a fake product
customer_reviews.text: The label on the bottle is blurry and poorly printed, which makes it seem like a fake product. Looks suspicious. Cannot trust that it is what it says it is. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Alla Fill

customer_reviews.title: Great for very VERY fine hair.
customer_reviews.text: Best hair oil I've found! I have very fine hair and this stuff, if put on very lightly will not make it look oily... if yours does look oily, you've put too much! :)
customer_reviews.author: J. Casey Bourgeois

customer_reviews.title: This feels good on the skin
customer_reviews.text: This feels good on the skin, especially my legs and hand that get dry in the winter months. Would repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Candice M. Schumaker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the oil! Won’t stop using it. Leaves skin silky smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Liz in NH

customer_reviews.title: Not good for my skin
customer_reviews.text: I got the product on time. I did not like this. The oil just sit on my face and didn’t absorb and made my skin dry
customer_reviews.author: Ang Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Bad Batch?
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually leave reviews unless its a awesome product or it sucks. This smelled horrible, the oil was sticky and it was leaking. I have seen a few others say the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas B

customer_reviews.title: Less wrinkles!
customer_reviews.text: Nice oil I use on my face smoother results, less wrinkles!
customer_reviews.author: whitedove

customer_reviews.title: Love to use as moisturizer on my face
customer_reviews.text: Love to use as moisturizer on my face. Just couple pumps in morning Last all day without making my skin oily
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for eczema
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4yo son who has eczema on neck, within his elbows and behind his knees. He's mood is irritable when skin is itchy. I've been using Marula oil for my face so I tried it with him and it healed him up in 2 days! I noticed his mood has been lifted significantly. Makes me a happy mom.
customer_reviews.author: Ceci

customer_reviews.title: ... on my face as a moisturizer and it works beautifully. It seems to help keep my face hydrated ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this oil on my face as a moisturizer and it works beautifully. It seems to help keep my face hydrated and happy without irritation. This little bottle lasts me several months. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: C. Dowd

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Very silky, It's about the same consistency as DHC olive oil.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Marteney

customer_reviews.title: Oil is OK
customer_reviews.text: Oil is good quality, but I don't know the effects (means it's working for hair and face)
customer_reviews.author: A. K. Karipineni

customer_reviews.title: really feels good and works great/
customer_reviews.text: I mix this with Bag Balm Ointment .... really feels good and works great/
customer_reviews.author: James H. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Great new serum!
customer_reviews.text: Very well absorbing, not too greasy! It leaves my skin well nourished. It is fragrance free, this is a plus. Love this oil.
customer_reviews.author: eva dam

customer_reviews.title: Oil leaks from bottle
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived on May 2. A few days ago I noticed a teeny bit of oil on the top part of the label and assumed that when I sprayed it some must have dripped down. Five days later there's oil along the top and bottom of the label. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Anne Clement

customer_reviews.title: Great oil, no scent and smooth youthful looking skin!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent oil, gives my body a nice glow, smoothness and no greased look or feel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: absolutely wonderfull. used in bath, soaked 15 minutes ...
customer_reviews.text: absolutely wonderfull. used in bath, soaked 15 minutes, skin sooo soft, even the bottom of my feet. It reminds me of the fountain of youth. yes buy it
customer_reviews.author: Janet Halladay

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great packaging
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great packaging, great price per ounce! If you've been wanting to try Drunk Elephant marula oil, save yourself some money and get this :)
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This cured my dry skin patches on my face during the winter!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Great hydration
customer_reviews.text: I like the consistency of this oil. It’s thick enough to act like a moisturizer but absorbs into my skin well, so I don’t feel greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, I will never use any lotion ever ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, I will never use any lotion ever again. Doesnt feel greasy at all and feels so good on your skin
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Been using it every night, keep my face moist not dry
customer_reviews.author: wannie ong

customer_reviews.title: Great for nails and skin.
customer_reviews.text: Love on hands and feet. Made my nails smooth and healthy as well as the skin. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Ann Shulta

customer_reviews.title: it seems good. But not sure about results as of yet
customer_reviews.text: Just got it. Waiting for miracle. Thus far, it seems good. But not sure about results as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: pat

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Feels great on your skin . It's not greasy feeling at all .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. No break outs, just soft skin.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful oil!
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using for about 4 days, but so far I am loving this oil. It soaks into the skin nicely and doesn't leave an oil residue. It feels wonderful and so far has went nicely under make up with my other serums and sunscreen. I am not certain yet, but I think this is helping with redness that I get on my upper chest, between my collar bones. This came packaged nicely in a small silver box. Smell is nice, oil-like and dissipated as soon as it was on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: Label was torn and too small to read, looks fake
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: I'll never buy this product again!
customer_reviews.text: This product is very inferior to Shea Terra Organics - Marula Oil, which I have purchased from Amazon many times, and have been very happy with the results. But, I saw the price of this product and twice as much in the bottle. No wonder they won't let me return it! It is a very bad product and I feel dry within an hour of using it. I would NEVER re-buy this brand of Marula oil. Very disappointing that I cannot return it!
customer_reviews.author: Anna-marie Powers

customer_reviews.title: Great product. The pump was shattered when I opened ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The pump was shattered when I opened the box which was disappointing but you can use it without the pump. Great for face & hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product! I received a sample from another source ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! I received a sample from another source and wanted more. Found this source on Amazon and received it within 2 days. The products is wonderful--for my face and hair. Great quality, nice packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated!!
customer_reviews.text: I was not able to use or even enjoy the oil, UPS left the package in my open garage. Package being so small my husband ran it over. Who's to blame, us for having the garage door open or UPS?
customer_reviews.author: jalisha

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality marula oil, professional company
customer_reviews.text: Slight mis-hap with Amazon listing, company corrected the issue-- they responded professionally to amend the situation of incorrect item being mailed to me twice. A company that is willing to go the extra mile and correct a problem is worth purchasing from. I have tried two other brands of Marula oil -- this brand by Cavin Schon is of excellent quality, absorbs into the skin, leaves my face feeling soft and rehydrated. I would recommend this product to others, and I recommend this company, as well.
customer_reviews.author: SW Research(er) - anthro chiq

customer_reviews.title: Not rich and the faint scent wasn’t pleasant.
customer_reviews.text: The formula is not very rich compared to my other, much, much, much more expensive, African Botanics Marula oil, which is scented w neroli. This product has very little smell, which is good because the fragrance that it does have is not very pleasant. It is fairly absorbent. I add a few drops of my favorite essential oil to it which has made it more pleasant to use. I think that I will bite the bullet and purchase another bottle of African Botanics Marula oil which is luxurious. If you can afford it but it and it does last a long time use only a drop or two.
customer_reviews.author: M J

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: In today's expensive market loaded with outrageous expensive fake facial creams and lotions loaded with chemicals!! I chose to keep it simple, and organic. I use Cavin Schon 100% Pure Marula Seeds Oil for Face daily before going to work, noticed my skin loves its high content of linoleic acid that is an omega-6 essential fatty acid as well as omega oleic acid. It is not only highly effective in treating dry skin, but also in preventing and healing a variety of skin disorders, including psoriasis, eczema, acne, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Soto

customer_reviews.title: It has a wonderfully, subtle scent
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this as a body oil for a couple years now. I think I'm on my third or fourth bottle. It has a wonderfully, subtle scent, and absorbs very quickly. Having aging skin, its important to me to use a product that takes away the look of dry and aging skin. This does it for me. Also, does not leave an oily residue that rubs off on clothes. This oil is far superior to another one I bought that had a little better price. One more point, The Henna Guys provide wonderful customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Oregon Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: I saw some ads for the expensive marula oil face serum and the active ingredient is marula oil. So i decided why pay $70 for a small bottle of oil when I can get similar oil for a lot cheaper. Gave this brand a try and so far very happy. The oil is thick so I only use 2-3 pumps for my face. It absorbs fast and doesn't leave shiny residue. Pretty happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: julia_le

customer_reviews.title: No clogging or thick feeling!  And it works!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best oil I’ve used in my lifetime. I love it!!! 🥰 It leaves your skin soft and supple. It’s very light and absorbs quickly. I already have great skin for my age. This oil keeps my face in check. Baby smooth and makes my skin look look youthful. I highly recommend this oil to anyone looking for a healthy and youthful look. No need for moisturizer for me. When you apply to your face, keep in mind that less is more! 😉
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Best facial product I've bought in years!
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way...So it is worth every penny. I've been using it a week & the over night change for the better was & is amazing. My skin feels so much better. I'm done using facial lotions for a while because I love this oil.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4 fl. Oz Cavin Schon 100% Pure Marula Seeds Oil for Face & Hair
customer_reviews.text: I am going to be 65 this year and I have been using this product for a long time and it really helps my skin stay youthful - I tried another brand the time before last and found that odd brand grainy and oily and will keep with Cavin Schon from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Ginger M. Adams

customer_reviews.title: I really like this product
customer_reviews.text: I use this as part of my daily face routine. I have very very oily skin, and this has helped diminish the number of breakouts (in collaboration with the other products I use). When I am in a hurry, I simply do the toner, Marula oil, and a moisturizer. I have used this alone as a moisturizer, and it has also worked very well. I really like this product.
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Was optimistic
customer_reviews.text: I was very optimistic based on the reviews and the fact that it is the active ingredient in other more expensive skin brands I have tried, but it didn't work for me. I don't know if I got a contaminated batch or my skin just didn't like it but it made my neck break out in hives or some red rashes or something as seen in the picture. I tried to keep using it in hopes that it would go away but that didn't happen unfortunately I wish I could return it but I don't think I can get a refund now.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a 4 oz bottle, received a 2 ounce bottle. The company reached out shortly after and sent along the correct product. I love this oil, great for dry climate. I prefer it to coconut oil which never seems to fully abdorb.
customer_reviews.author: LLorson

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and quality
customer_reviews.text: This oil is great, it’s a great price too. It smells faintly of hippies but it’s not a strong scent and dissipates very quickly. So, it’s worth it. I also really love the pump that comes with it. Another brand sells this same type of oil for $40 for .5oz this was like $12 for 2oz. This is a great alternative.
customer_reviews.author: lisa ellery

customer_reviews.title: not that good for my face
customer_reviews.text: not that good for my face, I'm using it on my body and my husband is using it as well. he has a very dry patch and after using it, that area isn't as dry and rough anymore
customer_reviews.author: Soua Thao

customer_reviews.title: No scent, great for face
customer_reviews.text: This makes my face feel dewy and soft in this harsh winter weather. I also mixed some with other oils and oil esthers for a leg balm for my diabetic husband that seems to work for stopping his dry itchy legs after a shower. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal W.Top Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: I really loved this oil
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this oil, and it mirrors the Drunk Elephant really well, but after about 3/4 through the bottle it oxidized and began to smell like battery acid :(
customer_reviews.author: kassie lafazia

customer_reviews.title: Graphite oil?
customer_reviews.text: Unsure if this product had expired or just not what it says it is-very strong unpleasant odor like graphite-I'm highly dissatisfied and need to look on the bottle to see if there is a contact option as this seems toxic.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Faniola

customer_reviews.title: Don’t count on using as a spray
customer_reviews.text: Used it for first time tonight. Nice scent and didn’t leave my skin oily. Only complaint though is that the bottle came with a lid and the spray attachment and lid absolutely did not fit. The lid was too big and the hose inside was way too long.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Best Skin Care Product
customer_reviews.text: The Marula Oil is a great product to keep your skin soft and supple. It helps counteract drying effects on the skin especially dry air,wind, snow, and cold. It moisturizes the skin on face and body without clogging your pores. It is absorbed by the skin and best applied while the skin moist from the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Diderich

customer_reviews.title: Good oil. Just not pure
customer_reviews.text: The original pure marula absorbs quickly. I like this oil but I do not like tge oiliness. It is still worth trying
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product I have been using it and noticed the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product I have been using it and noticed the fresh feeling on my face. So far the aroma of my hair was really the thing I noticed immediately. Thanks again!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great seller, great product.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this at first.. It came before the expected arrival date. I have been using marula oil for my hair for some time and wanted to try it for my face. I used it for a week and my face felt so smooth and soft afterwards. It was very light and didn't feel heavy or greasy on my face at all. But after a month of use, it was breaking my face out so badly. My face does not tolerate coconut oil well either. I had high hopes for this but it just didn't work out for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sticky and Stinky
customer_reviews.text: I do not like this oil at all. It is rather heavy for the face and is somewhat sticky. I definitely do not like the smell. Buy Cacay Oil. It’s fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: vickiwellmanvi

customer_reviews.title: great oil, cheap pump
customer_reviews.text: Great oil but the pump is cheap and often dispenses in great gushes. thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Williams

customer_reviews.title: I don’t like to use this on my face because it leaves ...
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like to use this on my face because it leaves the face very very oily but overall very good quality oil
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the BEST!!
customer_reviews.text: Have used several different brands of Marula oil. This is by far the BEST!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the oil cause it moisturizes winter time skin beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: PoppyK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was my 3rd time purchasing this product. I use it as extra moisturizer. Twice a day before putting my face cream . It keeps my face moist at all time without feeling oilly.
customer_reviews.author: tywny

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the product except for the packaging. It leaks despite being fully sealed and stored upright.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bengston

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems as good as the more expensive versions. At a much better price!
customer_reviews.author: K. Inge

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry skin and my skin loves this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: C. Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived a day early! My skin is loving it. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Makes my skin and hair smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Tanji

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil! It goes on easy and my skin just soaks it up.
customer_reviews.author: Anne M. Allison

product_meta.title: 2 fl. Oz Cavin Schon 100% Pure Marula Seeds Oil for Face & Hair - Luxury Beauty - Perfect anti-aging serum
product_meta.description: Size:2 fl. OzAll Natural & Cold Pressed Marula Oil - Excellent Natural Alternative for traditional lotions and creams.
feature_bullets: ★ All Pure & Natural :: 100% Pure Marula Oil , No Fillers, No Dilutions, No Paraben, No Alcohol, No Fragrance, No Additives. The Highest Premium Grade.

★ Benefits & Uses :: Acts as an Antioxidant serum & UV protector, Limits harmful effects of free radicals that damage skin & hair cells, No additives, chemicals or artificial preservatives, non-GMO, cruelty free, gluten free
★ Best Value & Cold Pressed :: Our Marula seed oil is cold pressed to Preserve its Vital Nutrients, Packaged in Huge Amber Glass Bottles with Treatment Pump for Clean Dispensing.
